content: row 2 chain 3 double_crochet in next st 1 half_double_crochet in each of next 2 sts single_crochet in last st turn row 3 ch1 doesn t count as st single_crochet in first st 1 half_double_crochet in each of next 2 sts 1 double_crochet in last 2 sts fasten_off repeat for other side with c and yarn needle embroider on eyes throw to nearest kitty and watch wackiness ensue craft kitten also grants permission to make and sell these cat toys for charitable causes www craftkitten com © craft kitten 2008 all rights reserved do not copy or distribute without permission sale of finished items is prohibited
